column4: pici: i made a mistake and erased menu.lst from gurb folder!! i booted my pc thru ubuntu live cd,, i made a folder named "A" and mounted my ext3 partition over it! to give it write permission i did "chmod -R 777 A" , i got back my grub.. but i cant get sudo su :(
you are probably not in the group that's allowed to use sudo... i don't know the command that'll let you in, sorry
